title: Randle-Towns trade, Bridges to New York, Sixers add George: Regrading 2024 offseason moves
description: NBA expert Kevin Pelton looks back at 10 of the biggest trade and free agency moves and regrades them.
author: Kevin Pelton

title: D.C. mayor 'focused' on RFK deal, not Trump talk
description: Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser remains confident that the Commanders will return to the city but steered clear of President Donald Trump's threats to scuttle a stadium deal if the team does not return to its former name.
author: John Keim

title: Jonas Valanciunas says he's 'fully committed' to Nuggets amid speculation he'd try to leave team to play in Greece
description: Valanciunas ended speculation that he wouldn't report to the Nuggets amid reported offers from Greece's Panathinaikos.
author: Jason Owens

title: Paul Skenes dazzles in his first start since the All-Star Game as the Pirates blank the Tigers 3-0
description: Paul Skenes allowed three hits over six efficient innings and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat the Detroit Tigers 3-0 on Monday night. Skenes (5-8), who last week became the first pitcher to start the All-Star game in each of the first two years of his career, struck out six, walked one and a hit batter to pick up his first victory since late May. The 23-year-old lowered his ERA to a major league-best 1.91 as Pittsburgh responded from a weekend sweep at home by the lowly Chicago White Sox by keeping the team that entered Monday with the best record in the majors in check.
author: WILL GRAVES

title: 'I wore this shirt growing up' - Man Utd sign Mbeumo
description: Bryan Mbeumo says he has joined "the club of his dreams" after the winger completes his move from Brentford to Manchester United for an initial Â£65m.

title: Taking the knee 'not good enough' - Wiegman
description: England manager Sarina Wiegman says her players decided to stop taking the knee before matches because the impact of the anti-racism gesture is "not good enough".

title: 'Special feeling' - Scheffler storms to dominant major win at The Open
description: Scottie Scheffler claimed a fourth major title and completed a third leg of the career Grand Slam by cruising to a dominant four-shot victory at The Open.

title: MVG grinds out win against Barney as Price edges Gurney in ill-tempered epic
description: Michael van Gerwen ground out a 10-6 win over Dutch rival Raymond van Barneveld in the first round of the World Matchplay as Gerwyn Price edged an ill-tempered epic against Daryl Gurney which finished with the pair exchanging an angry handshake.
